name: The Cabin (itch) (thebitpriest)
description:
Why can't you remember a time before the snow started falling?

The Cabin is a short, first person, point and click, mystery adventure set in a cabin. Why is this cabin here? Better yet, why are you here?

The Cabin is a proof-of-concept game created in 15 days for the November 2020 AGS monthly adventure game challenge.
